template.name: uimain
template.value:
local gameUI = gameUI local gameUILayerWindow =require("game.core.gameUILayerWindow") ---@class $CLASSNAME$ local $CLASSNAME$ = class("$CLASSNAME$",gameUILayerWindow) gameUI.Init($CLASSNAME$)
function $CLASSNAME$:OnDestory() $CLASSNAME$.super.OnDestory(self) end
function $CLASSNAME$:awake() $CLASSNAME$.super.awake(self) self:bindUI(self._uiObject)
self:onRefresh() end
function $CLASSNAME$:onRefresh()
end
return $CLASSNAME$

template.name: uicell
uimainScroll
template.value:
local gameUI = gameUI local gameUILayerWindow =require("game.core.gameUILayerWindow") ---@class $CLASSNAME$ local $CLASSNAME$ = class("$CLASSNAME$",gameUILayerWindow) gameUI.Init($CLASSNAME$)
function $CLASSNAME$:OnDestory() for k, item in pairs(self.m_Table) do item:destory() end $CLASSNAME$.super.OnDestory(self) end
function $CLASSNAME$:awake() $CLASSNAME$.super.awake(self) self:bindUI(self._uiObject)
self.m_Table = {}
self:onRefresh() end
function $CLASSNAME$:onRefresh() self.m_array = {} self.c_scorll_list.LoopVerticalScrollRect.totalCount = #self.m_array self.c_scorll_list.LoopVerticalScrollRect:RefillCells(0) end
function $CLASSNAME$:OnScrollCellIndexChange_scorll_list(transIndex,dataIndex) local data = self.m_array[dataIndex] if self.m_Table[transIndex] == nil then local item = uiArenaRankItem:create(data) local objName = "c_storage_item_node"..transIndex local par = self[objName] local trans = item.mUIObject.transform trans:SetParent(par.Image.gameObject.transform) trans.localPosition = Vector3(0,0,0) SKUnityTools.toInitTransform(item.mUIObject.transform) item:setCallback(handler(self, self._onClick)) self.m_Table[transIndex] = item else self.m_Table[transIndex]:updateData(data) end end
return $CLASSNAME$
